title: Halo Infinite Season 2 & Metroid Dread New Update Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.08.22
description:
Blessing and Andy close the week out with details on Halo's new season, Metroid Dread talk, and Blessing's superior way of eating waffles along with other food items.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:15:32 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. That’s me and Janet talking about the new season, backlog season, and talking about what the rest of the year looks like for games. You can catch that on youtube.com/kindafunnygames, and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Pranksy, & Anonymous
The Roper Report  -
00:16:11 - Halo Infinite season 2 launches in early May - Nicole Carpenter @ Polygon
00:26:09 - Metroid Dread Has a New Boss Rush Mode - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:33:50 - Ad
00:40:08 - We have our Bafta Games Awards results - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:43:55 - This year’s new Need for Speed game is reportedly now current-gen only - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:51:06 - The Sonic movie director says he’d love to make a Smash Bros movie - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:59:23 - What is Idris Elba hiding???
01:03:00 - Out today
01:04:45 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and Janet
THURS: Greg and Blessing
FRI: Bless and Tim
